portfolio.name: COVID-19 Relief Initiative
portfolio.description: An inventory management application built to track the flow of 3D-printed PPE (face-shields, earsavers, and masks) from AT&T volunteers to essential workers across the nation.

portfolio.name: Internal Open Source Platform
portfolio.description: An internal open-source hub that allowed new-hire developers to collaborate with their peers across the nation via code-sharing and blog posts.

portfolio.name: Internal Design System
portfolio.description: An internal design system with an accompanying Sketch UI Kit for designers, CSS Framework, and React Component library to allow developers and designers alike to create beautiful, trendy user interfaces.
